strings.name: YouthMappers UP Resilience Institute
strings.description: YouthMappers chapter at University of the Philippines Resilience Institute
strings.extendedDescription: The UP Resilience Institute was established in 2016 with a mission statement to empower local communities through multidisciplinary research and actions toward resilience. Through UP NOAH Center, and the help of different organizations, we have provided building exposure maps for 17 provinces out of the 82 and uploaded more than 4 million footprints to Open Street Maps.
